statements: UPDATE GeneticData SET genotype = 'AA' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE patients SET age = age + 1 WHERE gender = 'Female'
UPDATE samples SET quantity = quantity * 1.1 WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
UPDATE genes SET gene_name = CONCAT('New-', gene_name) WHERE chromosome = 'X'
